1:
À Dagwi Darwey, hwà sé ra shom, hwà sé tabak me.
A ga vey ano! Tik me!
2:
Hwà ga mǎ me na ket mō;
hwà ga nɔrɔs me vwɔ.
3:
Yaga shom mō, dem hak ha to sé nang wɛt,
mwa nedem hom na ga tɛ́ ɛn jwɛɛnɛn yaga banɛn hom.
4:
Neburu hom na ga sɔ a me to,
na sé a me pyɛ nedirik de mê kyɛm me jut wɛt.
5:
Má ra netɔ̌n, ma jut o na jɔgɔ,
yaga ano, baram hom ba ga bɔsɔ bé ro nesang.
6:
Ma ga ye nguk, ma ga tɛ́ me gbɛrɛk,
ko me wosho e de tosho.
7:
Rebek hom ra fes sede kya,
dem hak ha to sé nang wɛt.
8:
Ma ga sɔ me, vit a bwâng gap, ko ma ga tɛ́ me buruk,
yey hom ye bɔgɔs, me rus yaga nepep.
9:
À Darwey, hwà tɔk pyɛ de ma vɔk cwey yɛ,
hwà ga wok rus hom.
10:
Nesong né rasa a me, gap hom ha ga tala hɛ,
bayis hom ba ga tɛ́ ɛn hywiinin.
11:
Besa hom tanga bemât vwara hom be vey bagat na me wɛt
yaga baram hom, belɔ hom mwa ba ye jaram à me.
12:
Vemo de be simo wey na me be rene bagun,
ko vemo de be simo be mǎ me be tɛsɛ a me bengyip wey na me.
Mwa wosho be yong pyɛ́ vyes vey sɛ̀ me.
13:
Ko ma sé sede kpey, vit à wok ha,
ma sé sede tɔn, vit a tɔk ha.
14:
Ey, ma sé sede mwat de e wok ha wɛt,
ko e tɔk toyo na hɛ wɛt.
15:
Me sɛt bayis e ra hwo, à Dagwi Darwey, Dagwi hom,
hwo wɛ de hwô hanat e to hom.
16:
Ma ye, “Hwo tik vê repugu hom be feng yaga reyɔm de me sɔ
kɛ be dak kaa e ra gaba hom wɛt!”
17:
Ma sé e ji nepep kayɛ jeng,
ma sé lɛs e ra gaba.
18:
Ma sé kulu banɛn hom,
me lashe yey yaga pyɛ́ de ma ra.
19:
Vê repugu hom de be simo mɔrɔ me bé wok na gap,
pyak ba sé de be bɛɛ me ves, vit à tin.
20:
Be tala me na pyɛ́ vyes e tô nerat,
be kyɛ́ ɛn me, yaga me tē ngyɛ́k na me ra pyɛ́ ryat.
21:
À Dagwi Darwey, Dagwi hom, hwo ye waa a me
kɛ hwo sè yikyik na me wɛt!
22:
À Darwey, mwât sey me,
vey sɛlɛ me dey-dey!
